Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Monroe
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing Monroe due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing Monroe due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
